properties.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet/South Lincoln County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 11:41PM MST until February 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
...SNOW CONTINUES OVER FAR EASTERN COLORADO...

.A storm system moving over Colorado tonight continues producing light
to moderate snow over the Palmer Divide and other parts of east
central Colorado. As the storm system moves eastward overnight,
snow over northeast and east central Colorado will come to an end.
Total snow accumulations could reach up to 5 inches over eastern
Elbert and Lincoln Counties.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Up to 2 inches of additional accumulation
overnight. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches.

* WHERE...Southern Lincoln County.

* WHEN...Snow will be coming to an end after midnight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or
visiting www.cotrip.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY
